Imports

vao, vbo, mvp_matrix, shader, program

Types

BindedShape[vertex_num; vertex_num_3x; vertex_num_4x] = ref ShapeObj[true,
    vertex_num, vertex_num_3x, vertex_num_4x]
Shape[vertex_num; vertex_num_3x; vertex_num_4x] = ref ShapeObj[false,
    vertex_num, vertex_num_3x, vertex_num_4x]
ShapeObj[binded; vertex_num; vertex_num_3x; vertex_num_4x] = object
  vao: VAO
  positions: VBO[vertex_num_3x, float32]
  colors: VBO[vertex_num_4x, float32]
  model_matrix: array[4, VBO[vertex_num_4x, float32]]
  program: Program
